attributes.review: I got this app and then I got bug so bad I pooped myself don’t get this app u will regret this and for all my TikTok users Donald Duck is going to probably ban TikTok from the u.s plz do something and give this a 1 star review it’s for your own good Gen Z for the win

attributes.review: I tried to use this app to keep up with the latest news from our forever glorious and magical leader, but when I try to open it all I see is a cheeto. So disappointing.

attributes.review: Before ⏱I was even able to open this app 📲 I got a notification 🛑⚠️ that I was selected 👁👄 to be a part of Trumps 🟠🐷 underage sex trafficking🚦ring.  I opened 📤 the notification. And I saw pic of trumps tiny 🍤. I immediately 🧚🏻‍♂️✨🧚🏻‍♂️vomited 🤮 all over my bed 🛏.
attributes.title: Induced vomiting

attributes.review: This app literally has so many bad reviews for not working because ot doesnt i tried it for myself it keeps freezing at a certain point..now that i got your attention BLACK LIVES MATTER...
